DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to evaluate the effects of short-chain fructo-oligosaccharides on the frequency and constistency of stools in subjects with functional constipation
DOC.brief_title: Effects of scFOS on Stool Frequency in People With Functionnal Constipation
DOC.criteria: subjects with functional constipation subjects treated with laxative treatments subjects consuming more than 25g/day of dietary fibres pregnant women
